header.h2: It is time to complete the 2020 Census. In Cooke county only about %50 of citizens have completed the census and this is tied to federal funding!

div.p: Click here to fill out your census information now to help our community!

div.h2: Please read the information provided by the Center for Disease Control and Prevention at the following link: About Coronavirus Disease 2019 (COVID-19)

div.div: Click here to fill out your census information now to help our community!

h3.a: CISD's April School Board Meeting has been Rescheduled for Tuesday, April 28, at 6:30 pm in the CMS\CHS cafeteria.
Governor Abbott announced on April 17, 2020 that all schools in Texas are closed for the remainder of the school year.

div.div: The District will be reviewing this Executive Order and providing more information about our future plans next week.

h3.a: Callisburg ISD is providing Free Public WIFI access at each campus. Click here for information and maps of wifi access locations.
Governor Abbott has signed an Executive Order closing all schools through April 3rd.
